text_block_list.text: Muhuhu. Muhuhuehuehue......
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Oops. Sorry about that. 
I was just thinking about all the "fangirling" I'll be doing on 
my day off and couldn't help myself.
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
I've been putting a lot more into enjoying things than usual, see! 
Keeping my steeled will in mind――!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
...You're right. I did put in the effort. 
Day by day, giving love to my goddesses, worshipping them, 
building up my virtue――
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Right! I've steeled my will!! I, Digitan, will become an all-rounder! 
For the sake of witnessing ALL my faves with my own two eyes!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
"To worship Umamusume-chans is to gather virtue" ...and 
fangirling is one form of that worship. 
So, basically! Fangirling is an important part of my training!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text: No idea what she meant by "fangirling", but if she says so, then...

Huh? Tag along? For fangirling? 
Well, if you ask me, you're more than welcome to, but...
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
...A-are you sure you can handle it? This is pretty high 
power-level otaku stuff. Force yourself out of your comfort zone 
and you're liable to get exhausted...
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
choice_data_list: I won't do anything too crazy.

text_block_list.text:
...All right, I can tell, you're ready for this! 
Now, let's set off together―― on our "Faves Racing 
Completionist Tour"!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Gaaaaah! Coming out to Hanshin was so worth it~!! 
That debut was next level...!!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
You know the winning Umamusume-chan? Turns out her older 
sister retired last year, so she's taking up the torch! And it burns 
so haaawwttttt...
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text: Neither one of them's giving in! The two rivals, neck and neck! But Nakayama's famous for its narrow straights, you know--!? GWAAAAAHHH!?
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Oogh... Oooghh.... It'sh sho magnificent... 
Their clashing feelings, transcending the theoretical bounds of 
their aptitudes... Just & peak...
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
――The dirt track here at Ooi Racecourse is longer than most. 
The overwhelming betweener and chaser strategies tend to have 
an advantage here.
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
choice_data_list: What's this all of a sudden?

text_block_list.text:
She wanted to kick conventional wisdom to the curb and outrun 
them all―― That was her pride. 
So she ended things with a smile. Even if she finished fourth...
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Are you feeling it!? The Umamusume-chans' dazzling, 
unrelenting passion?! When they're full of life and happy, 
Digitan's happyyyyyyyyy!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Heck yeah! Time to go buy a crap ton of merch!! 
On your mark, Trainer-san!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Whoa, hang on!? ...Trainer-san, aren't you looking a little tired!? 
Take five and let me handle the shopping!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
...She hadn't come back in a bit. 
I got worried and went looking for her――

I can't believe I'd run into you here! 
I'm, like, a huge fan! Hyped as heck to see you!

What made you decide to run both turf and dirt!? 
Gotta be something out of this world, right!?
text_block_list.name: Fan

text_block_list.text:
Eh!? ....Uh.... well..... t-that's... 
Y'know, really, I, uh... 
Yeeeaap....
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Looks like that fan was asking a ton of questions she couldn't 
really handle.
...! T- Trainer-saaaaaann!!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Wahhh... Thanks a ton, Trainer-san. 
I'm not used to getting called out in public like that...
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Oh, yeah, what are you doing all the way over here?? 
You get lost?
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
choice_data_list: You were gone for a while, so...

text_block_list.text:
W-wow... You really made the trip all the way over here, even 
though you're so exhausted......Trainer-san――
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text: You really wanted the merch that much!?
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
Oh, come on, you! You don't need to explain yourself! 
You want the merch in your hands ASAP! 
I know that feel all too well!!
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
I get you, I get you. Yessiree. 
I'm so unbelievably touched by how deep you've gone in our 
fandom today.
text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital

text_block_list.text:
No, I just came to get you because I was worried... 
But she looked so happy talking, I let the misunderstanding slide 
and let her keep on going.
